title: War Pick +1

War Pick +1 Notes & Tips

Not all items will be sold at the same time. Leveling up or completing a Long Rest will reset the shop and potenially show different items. Rarity: Uncommon Value: 400 Gp. Weight: 1 Kg. ID: WPN_WarPick_1
